title: Muse
description: Trey's story. Coming early, 2017.I fall in love with a different woman every night. Hell, sometimes I even fall in love twice in one night. My name’s Trey Baker, rock star and self-professed Casanova of the twenty-first century. I don’t do relationships. I don’t have to.Until her.Sure, I was warned to stay away from her and I tried my best…for almost five minutes. Scout’s honour. But when the forbidden fruit turns up at my door, begging to be plucked, how can I say no?
author: K.E. Taylor
